name: Ship Wrecked (Prototypex87)
description:
Stranded on a desert island. Scavenge for materials to make your raft and sail to safety.

Controls: 

WASD or arrow keys to move.

[SPACE BAR] to interact with objects.

Try using different items on different objects and see what happens.

Music:

'8 Bit Shanty' by Benjamin Bublitz

'Jive Tofurky' By Tarver Nova

Created for game jam: https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-194
